TopicTitle: Jeb's Junkyard and Spaceship Parts Co. - Commercial Launch Services!

Articles.Content:
Jeb's Junkyard and Spaceship Parts Co.

Hello! This is Raymon Kerman, CEO of Jeb's Junkyard and Spaceship Parts Co. I have realized instead of contracting to the KSP, we could be better off creating our own space launch vehicles. Therefore we have begun development of a small orbital launch vehicle, codenamed 'Swift'. We have no finished renderings of the vehicle, but they will be here soon. This is all we have, and we project that we can launch the first test launch in quite a bit of time.

Raymon Kerman
CEO of Jeb's Junkyard Co.

P.S. And no, Jeb doesn't work for us. He simply sponsors us.
soo...do we upload the craft file and you fly it or what?
